Constructs a new {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}}.
@1@ Constructs a {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}} using the return value of {{c|std::experimental::pmr::get_default_resource()}} as the underlying memory resource.
@2,3@ Constructs a {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}} using {{c|other.resource()}} as the underlying memory resource.
@4@ Constructs a {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}} using {{c|r}} as the underlying memory resource. This constructor provides an implicit conversion from {{tt|memory_resource*}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}} to copy from}}
{{par|r|pointer to the memory resource to use. May not be null}}
{{par end}}

===Exceptions===
@4@ Throws nothing.
